short_summary: The data you have requested matches the needs for a particular service in relation to Brand Monitoring and Energy star.
description: Provide a service that monitors the use of the ENERGY STAR® brand (name and marks) on online marketplaces across Canada. Products must have the certification mark displayed on the packaging, labeling or promotional materials. The service will be expected to keep records and provide written reports of instances where the ENERGY STAR certification mark has been misused or the product does not meet the certification requirements.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Information**
--------------------

### Tender Name

ENERGY STAR Brand Monitoring

### Solicitation Number

5000072745

### Tender Closing Date

March 23, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. ET

### Contracting Entity

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)

### Contact Information

* Name: Thai, Raymond
* Email: [raymond.thai@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca](mailto:raymond.thai@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available
* Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4

### Tender Description

NRCan is seeking a service provider to monitor the use of the ENERGY STAR brand (name and marks) in online marketplaces across Canada. The service is required to identify instances of misuse of the ENERGY STAR brand or marks, such as the ENERGY STAR certification mark on uncertified products.

The monitoring efforts should focus on the most visible sites, including large-scale retailers and known targets identified by NRCan to ensure protection of the ENERGY STAR brand. The service provider should have expertise in brand protection and be able to identify and report instances of misuse of the ENERGY STAR brand.

### Tender Requirements

* The service provider must have experience in brand protection and monitoring.
* The service provider must be able to identify and report instances of misuse of the ENERGY STAR brand.
* The service provider must have expertise in online marketplaces and be able to monitor the use of the ENERGY STAR brand across various platforms.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to qualified service providers who are participating in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available for download from the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.

### Attachments

Please find the following attachments:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/10/d4f6faf0913282c27aa8199926c39715/rfp_5000072745_-_energy_starr_brand_monitoring_service.pdf
